trans-unit.source: Specifies that an application settings property has a common value for all users of an application.
trans-unit.target: 指定應用程式設定屬性對於應用程式的所有使用者具有通用值。

trans-unit.source: Application settings properties have a scope that is based either at the application or the user level.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式設定屬性具有，取決於應用程式或使用者層級的範圍。

trans-unit.source: As the categories imply, application-scoped settings properties present uniform values to all users of the application, whereas user-scoped properties have dedicated values for each user of the application.
trans-unit.target: 如分類所暗示，應用程式範圍的設定屬性則會顯示統一值給所有使用者的應用程式，而使用者範圍的屬性具有專用應用程式的每位使用者的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute> indicates that a property should be considered an application-level setting, and that appropriate storage decisions should be made accordingly by the settings provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute>表示屬性應該視為應用程式層級設定，並適當的儲存體決策應該進行據以設定提供者。

trans-unit.source: A scope attribute is required for each settings property.
trans-unit.target: 需要為每個設定的屬性範圍屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a property is not applied with either a <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute> or <xref:System.Configuration.UserScopedSettingAttribute>, the property is not recognized by the settings provider—it is not serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不會套用使用<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute>或<xref:System.Configuration.UserScopedSettingAttribute>，設定提供者無法辨識的屬性，都沒有序列化。

trans-unit.source: It is invalid, however, to apply both attributes to the same property.
trans-unit.target: 是無效的不過，若要將這兩個屬性套用至相同的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Such an attempt will cause a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Each application settings property must be applied with a single scope attribute in order for it to be recognized and serialized by the settings provider.
trans-unit.target: 每個應用程式設定屬性必須套用具有單一領域屬性，才能讓它辨識和序列化的設定提供者。
